-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | EWMH utilities for XHB
--   
@package xhb-ewmh
@version 0.1.3.1

module Graphics.XHB.Ewmh.Serialize
class Serialize a where toBytes = unpack . runPut . serialize fromBytes bs = case runGetOrFail deserialize (pack bs) of { Right (_, _, a) -> Right a Left (_, _, e) -> Left e } serializeList = mapM_ serialize deserializeList = fmap toList $ loop empty where loop as = do { b <- isEmpty; if b then return as else deserialize >>= loop . snoc as }
serialize :: Serialize a => a -> Put
toBytes :: Serialize a => a -> [Word8]
deserialize :: Serialize a => Get a
fromBytes :: Serialize a => [Word8] -> Either String a
serializeList :: Serialize a => [a] -> Put
deserializeList :: Serialize a => Get [a]
instance [overlap ok] Serialize ClientMessageData
instance [overlap ok] Serialize ClientMessageEvent
instance [overlap ok] Serialize WINDOW
instance [overlap ok] Serialize ATOM
instance [overlap ok] Serialize Int
instance [overlap ok] Serialize Word32
instance [overlap ok] Serialize Word8
instance [overlap ok] Serialize String
instance [overlap ok] Serialize Char
instance [overlap ok] (Serialize a, Serialize b, Serialize c, Serialize d) => Serialize (a, b, c, d)
instance [overlap ok] (Serialize a, Serialize b, Serialize c) => Serialize (a, b, c)
instance [overlap ok] (Serialize a, Serialize b) => Serialize (a, b)
instance [overlap ok] Serialize a => Serialize [a]

module Graphics.XHB.Ewmh.Types
type EwmhT = AtomCacheT
type EwmhCtx m = (Applicative m, MonadIO m, AtomCacheCtx m)
data NetSupported
NetSupported :: [EWMH_ATOM] -> [NET_WM_STATE] -> [NET_WM_ALLOWED_ACTIONS] -> [NET_WM_WINDOW_TYPE] -> NetSupported
ewmhAtoms :: NetSupported -> [EWMH_ATOM]
netWmStates :: NetSupported -> [NET_WM_STATE]
netWmAllowedActions :: NetSupported -> [NET_WM_ALLOWED_ACTIONS]
netWmWindowTypes :: NetSupported -> [NET_WM_WINDOW_TYPE]
data NetDesktopGeometry
NetDesktopGeometry :: Word32 -> Word32 -> NetDesktopGeometry
netDesktopGeometry_width :: NetDesktopGeometry -> Word32
netDesktopGeometry_height :: NetDesktopGeometry -> Word32
data Viewport
Viewport :: Word32 -> Word32 -> Viewport
viewport_x :: Viewport -> Word32
viewport_y :: Viewport -> Word32
data NetDesktopViewport
NetDesktopViewport :: [Viewport] -> NetDesktopViewport
netDesktopViewport_viewports :: NetDesktopViewport -> [Viewport]
data NetActiveWindow
NetActiveWindow :: SourceIndication -> Maybe WINDOW -> NetActiveWindow
netActiveWindow_source_indication :: NetActiveWindow -> SourceIndication
netActiveWindow_currently_active_window :: NetActiveWindow -> Maybe WINDOW
data Workarea
Workarea :: Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> Workarea
workarea_x :: Workarea -> Word32
workarea_y :: Workarea -> Word32
workarea_width :: Workarea -> Word32
workarea_height :: Workarea -> Word32
data NetWorkarea
NetWorkarea :: [Workarea] -> NetWorkarea
netWorkarea_workareas :: NetWorkarea -> [Workarea]
data NetDesktopLayout
NetDesktopLayout :: NET_DESKTOP_LAYOUT_ORIENTATION -> NET_DESKTOP_LAYOUT_STARTING_CORNER -> Word32 -> Word32 -> NetDesktopLayout
orientation :: NetDesktopLayout -> NET_DESKTOP_LAYOUT_ORIENTATION
starting_corner :: NetDesktopLayout -> NET_DESKTOP_LAYOUT_STARTING_CORNER
columns :: NetDesktopLayout -> Word32
rows :: NetDesktopLayout -> Word32
data NetMoveresizeWindow
NetMoveresizeWindow :: SourceIndication -> Gravity -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Word32 -> Maybe Word32 -> NetMoveresizeWindow
netMoveresizeWindow_source_indication :: NetMoveresizeWindow -> SourceIndication
netMoveresizeWindow_gravity :: NetMoveresizeWindow -> Gravity
netMoveresizeWindow_x :: NetMoveresizeWindow -> Maybe Int
netMoveresizeWindow_y :: NetMoveresizeWindow -> Maybe Int
netMoveresizeWindow_width :: NetMoveresizeWindow -> Maybe Word32
netMoveresizeWindow_height :: NetMoveresizeWindow -> Maybe Word32
data NetWmMoveresize
NetWmMoveresize :: Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> NET_WM_MOVERESIZE_DIRECTION -> ButtonIndex -> SourceIndication -> NetWmMoveresize
netWmMoveresize_x_root :: NetWmMoveresize -> Maybe Int
netWmMoveresize_y_root :: NetWmMoveresize -> Maybe Int
netWmMoveresize_direction :: NetWmMoveresize -> NET_WM_MOVERESIZE_DIRECTION
netWmMoveresize_button :: NetWmMoveresize -> ButtonIndex
netWmMoveresize_source_indication :: NetWmMoveresize -> SourceIndication
data NetRestackWindow
NetRestackWindow :: SourceIndication -> WINDOW -> StackMode -> NetRestackWindow
netRestackWindow_source_indication :: NetRestackWindow -> SourceIndication
netRestackWindow_sibling_window :: NetRestackWindow -> WINDOW
netRestackWindow_detail :: NetRestackWindow -> StackMode
data NetWmDesktop
NetWmDesktop :: Word32 -> SourceIndication -> NetWmDesktop
netWmDesktop_new_desktop :: NetWmDesktop -> Word32
netWmDesktop_source_indication :: NetWmDesktop -> SourceIndication
data NetWmState
NetWmState :: NET_WM_STATE_ACTION -> NET_WM_STATE -> Maybe NET_WM_STATE -> SourceIndication -> NetWmState
netWmState_action :: NetWmState -> NET_WM_STATE_ACTION
netWmState_first_property :: NetWmState -> NET_WM_STATE
netWmState_second_property :: NetWmState -> Maybe NET_WM_STATE
netWmState_source_indication :: NetWmState -> SourceIndication
data NetWmStrut
NetWmStrut :: Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> NetWmStrut
netWmStrut_left :: NetWmStrut -> Word32
netWmStrut_right :: NetWmStrut -> Word32
netWmStrut_top :: NetWmStrut -> Word32
netWmStrut_bottom :: NetWmStrut -> Word32
data NetWmStrutPartial
NetWmStrutPartial :: Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> NetWmStrutPartial
netWmStrutPartial_left :: NetWmStrutPartial -> Word32
netWmStrutPartial_right :: NetWmStrutPartial -> Word32
netWmStrutPartial_top :: NetWmStrutPartial -> Word32
netWmStrutPartial_bottom :: NetWmStrutPartial -> Word32
netWmStrutPartial_left_start_y :: NetWmStrutPartial -> Word32
netWmStrutPartial_left_end_y :: NetWmStrutPartial -> Word32
netWmStrutPartial_right_start_y :: NetWmStrutPartial -> Word32
netWmStrutPartial_right_end_y :: NetWmStrutPartial -> Word32
netWmStrutPartial_top_start_x :: NetWmStrutPartial -> Word32
netWmStrutPartial_top_end_x :: NetWmStrutPartial -> Word32
netWmStrutPartial_bottom_start_x :: NetWmStrutPartial -> Word32
netWmStrutPartial_bottom_end_x :: NetWmStrutPartial -> Word32
data NetWmIconGeometry
NetWmIconGeometry :: Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> Word32 -> NetWmIconGeometry
netWmIconGeometry_x :: NetWmIconGeometry -> Word32
netWmIconGeometry_y :: NetWmIconGeometry -> Word32
netWmIconGeometry_width :: NetWmIconGeometry -> Word32
netWmIconGeometry_height :: NetWmIconGeometry -> Word32
data NetWmIconData
NetWmIconData :: Word8 -> Word8 -> Word8 -> Word8 -> NetWmIconData
netWmIconData_a :: NetWmIconData -> Word8
netWmIconData_r :: NetWmIconData -> Word8
netWmIconData_g :: NetWmIconData -> Word8
netWmIconData_b :: NetWmIconData -> Word8
data NetWmIcon
NetWmIcon :: Word32 -> Word32 -> [[NetWmIconData]] -> NetWmIcon
netWmIcon_width :: NetWmIcon -> Word32
netWmIcon_height :: NetWmIcon -> Word32
netWmIcon_data :: NetWmIcon -> [[NetWmIconData]]
netWmIconToPPM :: NetWmIcon -> String
data NetFrameExtents

netFrameExtents_left :: NetFrameExtents -> Word32
netFrameExtents_right :: NetFrameExtents -> Word32
netFrameExtents_top :: NetFrameExtents -> Word32
netFrameExtents_bottom :: NetFrameExtents -> Word32

netWmOpaqueRegion_y :: NetWmOpaqueRegion -> Word32
netWmOpaqueRegion_width :: NetWmOpaqueRegion -> Word32
netWmOpaqueRegion_height :: NetWmOpaqueRegion -> Word32
data NetWmSyncRequest
NetWmSyncRequest :: Word32 -> Word32 -> NetWmSyncRequest
netWmSyncRequest_low :: NetWmSyncRequest -> Word32
netWmSyncRequest_high :: NetWmSyncRequest -> Word32

module Graphics.XHB.Ewmh
runEwmhT :: (MonadIO m, Applicative m) => Connection -> EwmhT m a -> m (Either SomeError a)
getNetSupported :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> m (Either SomeError NetSupported)
setNetSupported :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> NetSupported -> m ()
getNetClientList :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> m (Either SomeError [WINDOW])
setNetClientList :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> [WINDOW] -> m ()
getNetClientListStacking :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> m (Either SomeError [WINDOW])
setNetClientListStacking :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> [WINDOW] -> m ()
getNetNumberOfDesktops :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> m (Either SomeError Word32)
setNetNumberOfDesktops :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> Word32 -> m ()
requestNetNumberOfDesktops :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> Word32 -> m ()
getNetDesktopGeometry :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> m (Either SomeError NetDesktopGeometry)
setNetDesktopGeometry :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> NetDesktopGeometry -> m ()
requestNetDesktopGeometry :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> NetDesktopGeometry -> m ()
getNetDesktopViewport :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> m (Either SomeError NetDesktopViewport)
setNetDesktopViewport :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> NetDesktopViewport -> m ()
requestNetDesktopViewport :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> Viewport -> m ()
getNetCurrentDesktop :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> m (Either SomeError Word32)
setNetCurrentDesktop :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> Word32 -> m ()
requestNetCurrentDesktop :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> Word32 -> m ()
getNetDesktopNames :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> m (Either SomeError [String])
setNetDesktopNames :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> [String] -> m ()
getActiveWindow :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> m (Either SomeError WINDOW)
setActiveWindow :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m ()
requestNetActiveWindow :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> NetActiveWindow -> m ()
getNetWorkarea :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> m (Either SomeError NetWorkarea)
setNetWorkarea :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> NetWorkarea -> m ()
getNetSupportingWmCheck :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> m (Either SomeError WINDOW)
setNetSupportingWmCheck :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m ()
getNetVirtualRoots :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> m (Either SomeError [WINDOW])
setNetVirtualRoots :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> [WINDOW] -> m ()
getNetDesktopLayout :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> m (Either SomeError NetDesktopLayout)
setNetDesktopLayout :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> NetDesktopLayout -> m ()
getNetShowingDesktop :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> m (Either SomeError Word32)
setNetShowingDesktop :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> Word32 -> m ()
requestNetShowingDesktop :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> Bool -> m ()
requestNetCloseWindow :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> SourceIndication -> m ()
requestNetMoveresizeWindow :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> NetMoveresizeWindow -> m ()
requestNetWmMoveresize :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> NetWmMoveresize -> m ()
requestNetRestackWindow :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> NetRestackWindow -> m ()
requestNetRequestFrameExtents :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m ()
getNetWmName :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m (Either SomeError [String])
setNetWmName :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> [String] -> m ()
getNetWmVisibleName :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m (Either SomeError [String])
setNetWmVisibleName :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> [String] -> m ()
getNetWmIconName :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m (Either SomeError [String])
setNetWmIconName :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> [String] -> m ()
getNetWmVisibleIconName :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m (Either SomeError [String])
setNetWmVisibleIconName :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> [String] -> m ()
getNetWmDesktop :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m (Either SomeError Word32)
setNetWmDesktop :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> Word32 -> m ()
requestNetWmDesktop :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> NetWmDesktop -> m ()
getNetWmWindowType :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m (Either SomeError [NET_WM_WINDOW_TYPE])
setNetWmWindowType :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> [NET_WM_WINDOW_TYPE] -> m ()
getNetWmState :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m (Either SomeError [NET_WM_STATE])
setNetWmState :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> [NET_WM_STATE] -> m ()
requestNetWmState :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> NetWmState -> m ()
getNetWmAllowedActions :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m (Either SomeError [NET_WM_ALLOWED_ACTIONS])
setNetWmAllowedActions :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> [NET_WM_ALLOWED_ACTIONS] -> m ()
getNetWmStrut :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m (Either SomeError NetWmStrut)
setNetWmStrut :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> NetWmStrut -> m ()
getNetWmStrutPartial :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m (Either SomeError NetWmStrutPartial)
setNetWmStrutPartial :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> NetWmStrutPartial -> m ()
getNetWmIconGeometry :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m (Either SomeError NetWmIconGeometry)
setNetWmIconGeometry :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> NetWmIconGeometry -> m ()
getNetWmIcon :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m (Either SomeError NetWmIcon)
setNetWmIcon :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> NetWmIcon -> m ()
getNetWmPID :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m (Either SomeError Word32)
setNetWmPID :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> Word32 -> m ()
getNetWmHandledIcons :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m (Either SomeError Word32)
setNetWmHandledIcons :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> Word32 -> m ()
getNetWmUserTime :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m (Either SomeError Word32)
setNetWmUserTime :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> Word32 -> m ()
getNetWmUserTimeWindow :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m (Either SomeError WINDOW)
setNetWmUserTimeWindow :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> WINDOW -> m ()
getNetFrameExtents :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m (Either SomeError NetFrameExtents)
setNetFrameExtents :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> NetFrameExtents -> m ()
getNetWmOpaqueRegion :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m (Either SomeError NetWmOpaqueRegion)
setNetWmOpaqueRegion :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> NetWmOpaqueRegion -> m ()
getNetWmBypassCompositor :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m (Either SomeError Word32)
setNetWmBypassCompositor :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> Word32 -> m ()
requestNetWmPing :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m ()
requestNetWmSyncRequest :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> NetWmSyncRequest -> m ()
requestNetWmFullscreenMonitors :: EwmhCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> NetWmFullscreenMonitors -> m ()
instance PropertyType UTF8_STRING
instance PropertyType Atom
instance XidLike Atom

module Graphics.XHB.Ewmh.Error
type EwmhErrorCtx m = (MonadError SomeError m, EwmhCtx m)
runEwmhT :: (MonadError SomeError m, MonadIO m, Applicative m) => Connection -> EwmhT m a -> m a
getNetSupported :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> m NetSupported
getNetClientList :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> m [WINDOW]
getNetClientListStacking :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> m [WINDOW]
getNetNumberOfDesktops :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> m Word32
getNetDesktopGeometry :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> m NetDesktopGeometry
getNetDesktopViewport :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> m NetDesktopViewport
getNetCurrentDesktop :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> m Word32
getNetDesktopNames :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> m [String]
getActiveWindow :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> m WINDOW
getNetWorkarea :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> m NetWorkarea
getNetSupportingWmCheck :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> m WINDOW
getNetVirtualRoots :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> m [WINDOW]
getNetDesktopLayout :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> m NetDesktopLayout
getNetShowingDesktop :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> m Word32
getNetWmName :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m [String]
getNetWmVisibleName :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m [String]
getNetWmIconName :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m [String]
getNetWmVisibleIconName :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m [String]
getNetWmDesktop :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m Word32
getNetWmWindowType :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m [NET_WM_WINDOW_TYPE]
getNetWmState :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m [NET_WM_STATE]
getNetWmAllowedActions :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m [NET_WM_ALLOWED_ACTIONS]
getNetWmStrut :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m NetWmStrut
getNetWmStrutPartial :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m NetWmStrutPartial
getNetWmIconGeometry :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m NetWmIconGeometry
getNetWmIcon :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m NetWmIcon
getNetWmPID :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m Word32
getNetWmHandledIcons :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m Word32
getNetWmUserTime :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m Word32
getNetWmUserTimeWindow :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m WINDOW
getNetFrameExtents :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m NetFrameExtents
getNetWmOpaqueRegion :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m NetWmOpaqueRegion
getNetWmBypassCompositor :: EwmhErrorCtx m => Connection -> WINDOW -> m Word32
